body_content.explanation: a single event or group of related events:
examples: This latest episode in the fraud scandal has shocked a lot of people.
The drugs, the divorce, and the depression - it's an episode in his life that he wants to forget.

body_content.explanation: a sudden short period in which someone suffers the effects of a physical or mental illness:
examples: I had an episode of severe chest pain.
The fainting episode was caused by heat.
He still has therapy for his PTSD and not long ago, he had an episode.

body_content.explanation: one of the single parts into which a story is divided, especially when it is broadcast on the television or radio
